definitions.definition: Befitting of a royal court; reflecting the manners or behaviour of people at court.
examples: He swept off his hat and made a deep courtly bow.
The troubadours sang songs about courtly love.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to a royal court .
examples: She tried to remain aloof from courtly intrigues.

definitions.definition: Overly eager to please or obey .

main_definition: Befitting of a royal court; reflecting the manners or behaviour of people at court.
secondary_definitions: Of or relating to a royal court .
( obsolete ) Overly eager to please or obey .
